snippet: An Asian-American veteran warns about the dangers of hazing in the armed services.
abstract: An Asian-American veteran warns about the dangers of hazing in the armed services.
lead_paragraph: The deaths of Army Private Danny Chen and Marine Lance Corporal Harry Lew have sent shock waves through Asian-American communities. Eight U.S. Army service members have been charged with hazing-related crimes against Private Chen, a Chinese-American soldier and, like me, the son of Chinese immigrants.

headline.main: An Asian-American Veteran Reflects on When Discipline Becomes Hazing
